channel.title: filesystem on Sparking Mind
channel.description: Recent content in filesystem on Sparking Mind

item.title: resize disk
item.description: Shrink a disk If the partition the file system is on is currently mounted, unmount it umount /dev/disk Run fsck on the umounted file system bash e2fsck -f /dev/disk Shrink the file system with the resize2fs /dev/fdisk size resize2fs /dev/disk size Use fdisk to modify the partition table information bash fdisk /dev/disk Mount the disk mount /dev/disk target
